name: set_ext_wall_to_ground_boundary_condition_by_story
display_name: Set Ext Wall to Ground Boundary Condition by Story

arguments.name: storyBasement
arguments.display_name: Choose a Story to Change Wall Boundary Conditions For

name_xml: Set Ext Wall To Ground Boundary Condition By Story
modeler_description_xml: This measure will find all exterior walls for spaces on the selected building story and change their outside boundary condition to ground. Make sure surface matching has been done first, or walls intended to be interior walls will end up with a ground boundary condition.
description_xml: Use this to setup one of your building stories as a basement.
